news.content: Talk at NVIDIA: 'Decomposing Elements of Problem Solving: What "Math" does RL Teach?' [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/190WhoZwEmyAy30hIm-moDxRdZjiL4vKp/view?usp=sharing).
Joined [Sigma-Xi](https://www.sigmaxi.org/), the scientific research honor society.
Seminar talk at KAIST Department of Physics: 'In-Context Learning: From toy models to practice.' [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Sp4D1b_4piMgJ9bWnlX6YJp7AnxBaoUG/view?usp=sharing).

Seminar talk at University of Tokyo Department of Physics: 'In-Context Learning: Algorithms and Representations'. [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1H84jXT2tTC4j4cf1nhVDPcrAUjMG18G3/view?usp=sharing).

Ph.D. Defense: 'Deep Learning as a Scientific Tool and a Model Organism of Intelligence'. [Slides](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1D_zToNK3TXGhazBjeNZYldYmgaywmckZ/view?usp=sharing), [Thesis](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ioXeY4p_a687NYnBPahItx6HeQcrSULq/view?usp=sharing).
